name: kindle-paste
title: Kindle Paste
description: Removes citation from text copied from Kindle, and pastes the text
author: jasoncarey

commands.name: paste-from-kindle
commands.title: Paste from Kindle
commands.description: Removes the automatic Kindle citation from clipboard and pastes the text

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
